Package org.jboss.seam.ejb

Integration with EJB 3.0.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
RemoveInterceptor Removes SFSB components from the Seam context after invocation of an EJB @Remove method, or when a system exception is thrown from the bean.
SeamInterceptor Controller interceptor for server-side interceptors of EJB3 session bean components.
 

Package org.jboss.seam.ejb Description

Integration with EJB 3.0. Nothing interesting here.
